comments.comments_text: Kerem Demirbay (Hoffenheim) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) is intercepted by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is intercepted by the defence.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Maycon (Shakhtar) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: A superb goal from great team play! Ismaily (Shakhtar) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent shot inside the right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A superb goal from great team play! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent shot inside the right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.

comments.comments_text: Taison (Shakhtar) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and drills the ball into the bottom right corner. Magnificent finish!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and drills the ball into the bottom right corner. Magnificent finish!

comments.comments_text: GOAL! Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) got to the ball in front of the goal and he couldn't miss from there. His strike went in off the right-hand post. The score is 1:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: GOAL! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) got to the ball in front of the goal and he couldn't miss from there. His strike went in off the right-hand post. The score is 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Sergey Kryvtsov (Shakhtar) works the corner short.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Sergey [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) works the corner short.

comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from Hoffenheim is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting set piece from [TEAM] is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: A yellow card for a tackle by Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar). Ivan Kruzliak doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A yellow card for a tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). [REFEREE] doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

comments.comments_text: Steven Zuber (Hoffenheim) gets to the ball inside the penalty area and produces a bullet header towards the goal. He aims his effort nicely low into the middle of the target, leaving Andrij Pyatov helpless. He makes it 2:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gets to the ball inside the penalty area and produces a bullet header towards the goal. He aims his effort nicely low into the middle of the target, leaving [PLAYER] helpless. He makes it 2:2.

comments.comments_text: Hoffenheim failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat. The ball goes behind for a corner. Hoffenheim will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Adam Szalai (Hoffenheim) should have been more careful. He commits a bad foul, receives his second yellow card and is sent-off!

comments.comments_text: Kevin Vogt (Hoffenheim) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Ivan Kruzliak didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
